pages.text: Beastmaster is an ability that lets gems tame wolves every 30 seconds, if the gem is a rebel, they will set the wolf aggressive to a nearby player. A beastmaster can only have up to five wolves at her side at one time.
$(l)Gems that are guaranteed to have it$()$(li)N/A$(br2) $(l)Gems that have a chance to have it$()$(li)Quartz$(li)Jasper$(li)Agate
